articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Developed with health experts, PairedWorld is designed to add value to existing NFT communities and encourage physical world interactions.
articles.title: A New Type of 'Social Token': PairedWorld Aims to Incentivize Real-World Connection

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Some experts believe the Singularity could occur within the next decade, although the implications for this event are broadly unknown and speculative.
articles.title: What Are the Dangers of AI?

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: A "legislative stalemate" in the U.S. has the crypto investment firm accelerating its plans to move offshore.
articles.title: Mike Novogratz: Galaxy Digital 'Looking at How Fast We Can Move People Offshore'

articles.description: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.
articles.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel

articles.description: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand SuperDuper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.
articles.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Superfan Base’: SuperDuper Co-founder

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The agency’s lawsuit against Binance and Coinbase has drawn the attention of other firms that offer stocks and crypto.
articles.title: eToro: 'We Remain a Supporter of Crypto' Amid Enforcement Blitz

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Part of the Aave open-source decentralized lending network, Lens encourages users to own their online presence via alternatives to platforms like Twitter.
articles.title: Lens Protocol Raises $15 Million to Expand Decentralized Social Media

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Society of Authors warned writers to be careful as “money today could simply speed up the absence of any work at all in the future.”
articles.title: UK Authors' Union Issues Guidance to 'Protect' Writers’ Work From AI

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The filing claims Binance entities commingled funds and funneled them to a Paxos affiliate through Merit Peak, which was controlled by Changpeng Zhao.
articles.title: Binance Moved Billions Through US Bank Accounts Controlled by CZ, Says SEC

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: "Say goodbye to meaningless likes and embrace the opportunity to earn money for your online contributions," said Zebedee co-founder Andre Neves.
articles.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin for Using This Twitter Alternative

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The new advertising rules will force first-time investors to wait 24 hours between requesting to purchase crypto and being able to buy.
articles.title: New UK Crypto Investors Face ‘Cooling-Off Period’ Under FCA Rules

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: It’s the battle of Pro headsets from tech giants. How does Apple’s first effort compare to the market leader’s top-end device?
articles.title: Apple Vision Pro vs. Meta Quest Pro: What's the Difference?

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Documents filed as part of the ongoing court case between the SEC and Binance allege that Gary Gensler and Changpeng Zhao have history.
articles.title: SEC Chair Gensler Offered to Serve as Binance Advisor in 2019, Lawyers Claim

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.
articles.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.
articles.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: ARK Invest is the second largest COIN shareholder behind Vanguard Group.
articles.title: Cathie Wood's ARK Bought $22M Worth of Coinbase Shares After the Price Tanked

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The SEC has gone after the two major crypto brands this week—but with very different allegations.
articles.title: What’s the Difference Between the Binance and Coinbase SEC Lawsuits?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Apple's Vision Pro could inject much-needed life into the sagging metaverse industry, but can the tech giant complement Web3's open ethos?
articles.title: Did Apple's Headset Reveal Revive the Web3 Metaverse—Or Kill It?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Georgia-based broadcaster claims defamation after ChatGPT allegedly said he embezzled funds.
articles.title: Radio Host Sues OpenAI for Libel After ChatGPT Accuses Him of Crime

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Hong Kong is trying to be a crypto hub again. This doesn’t mean China is following suit.
articles.title: ‘Big Ass No’: Hong Kong Trading Not a Sign China Is Warming Up to Crypto

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The agency has focused on Proof-of-Stake coins, leaving Bitcoin and other Proof-of-Work blockchains unfazed by the current regulatory push.
articles.title: The SEC Has Not Labeled Any Proof-of-Work Asset as a Security—Why Is That?

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Months after signaling a retreat from crypto efforts, GameStop axes CEO Matt Furlong and promotes Ryan Cohen to executive chairman.
articles.title: GameStop Fires CEO Who Oversaw Retailer's NFT Push

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The cryptocurrency exchange will drop over 40 trading pairs from their platform, the majority against USDT.
articles.title: Binance.US Pulls Several Trading Pairs in Wake of SEC Lawsuit

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.
articles.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs

articles.description: Sportswear brand Puma has partnered with NBA star LeMelo Ball to drop a limited edition pair of sneakers featuring Gutter Cat Gang branding.
articles.title: Puma Plots NFT Sneaker Drop With NBA's LaMelo Ball, Gutter Cat Gang

articles.description: After back-to-back SEC enforcement actions against centralized exchanges, Uniswap has seen a 41% increase in trading volume.

articles.description: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.
articles.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto

articles.description: SAG-AFTRA members seek “informed consent and fair compensation” if AI is used to recreate an actor’s likeness.
articles.title: SAG Head: AI Is a ‘Game Changer’ With Both Threats and Opportunities

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: "It does give us that legal certainty that we needed, but it’s just really a part of the story," Kraken's EU policy head said.
articles.title: Will MiCA Jumpstart Crypto in EU? It's ‘Too Early To Tell’, Says Circle

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: SAND was called out this week as the U.S. regulator targets Binance and Coinbase, but The Sandbox says it’s business as usual for now.
articles.title: Sandbox COO: 'We Do Not Agree' With SEC Labeling SAND Token a Security

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Jón Helgi Egilsson, a former chairman of the Icelandic central bank, urged his former counterparts to "embrace competition" on CBDCs.
articles.title: Central Banks Should Not Dominate CBDCs, Says an Ex-Central Banker

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Terra co-founder Do Kwon allegedly had financial relations with the leader of a political party in Montenegro.
articles.title: Do Kwon Claims to Have Backed Political Party in Montenegro: Report

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: It’s a fervent fight to top the album charts, and Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds is launching an NFT edition to try and eke out a win.
articles.title: Ex-Oasis Rocker Noel Gallagher Turns to NFTs to Top Foo Fighters in UK Chart Race

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: We’re heading towards a future where getting sofas up and down flights of stairs is no longer a Sisyphean chore.
articles.title: IKEA Research Studio Uses AI to Create a Folding Sofa that Fits in an Envelope

articles.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit has given the SEC seven days to clarify its position on a rulemaking petition from Coinbase.
articles.title: US Court Gives SEC One Week to Respond to Coinbase’s Rulemaking Petition

articles.description: “Treasure Trunks” is the first in a series of projects to entice the luxury brand’s elite clientele with exclusive perks.
articles.title: Louis Vuitton to Sell $41,000 NFTs to Top Customers

articles.description: The Emmy winning sci-fi creator found the AI tool only managed to write a subpar mashup of old episodes.
articles.title: 'Black Mirror' Creator Says ChatGPT Episode Script Was 'Shit'

articles.description: Lawmakers decry the release of Meta’s advanced and uncensored Large Language Model, and ask what the company is doing to minimize its damage.
articles.title: Senators Question Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg Over LLaMA AI Model “Leak”

articles.description: The “Shark Tank” star says today’s top digital asset firms are likely destined to live on only in history books.
articles.title: Kevin O’Leary: Binance Will Be 'Starved of Oxygen' by SEC’s Lawsuit

articles.description: Despite legal actions against the two largest cryptocurrency exchanges, only two tokens are seeing red candles today.
articles.title: Tokens Bounce Back Across the Market After SEC Triggers Turmoil

articles.description: If granted, the motion requests the repatriation of assets and the preservation of records.
articles.title: SEC Seeks Emergency Order to Freeze Binance US Assets

articles.description: Despite a crowded marketplace, Zoom has huge market share and is emphasizing real-time results.
articles.title: Meeting Giant Zoom Launches AI Meeting Summaries and Chat

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The collapsed exchange may be looking to sell its $500 million stake in a competitor to OpenAI.
articles.title: FTX Looking to Sell Shares in Anthropic Amid AI Boom: Semafor

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Coinbase legal chief Paul Grewal was in DC to speak at a hearing on the Digital Asset Market Structure Discussion Draft.
articles.title: Coinbase Plans to Fight SEC Lawsuit, Carry On With 'Business as Usual'

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: A key distinction between ChatGPT and earlier chatbot models is that it was developed and trained using a process known as reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF).
articles.title: What Are Possible Uses of ChatGPT?

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: California, Illinois, Maryland, and New Jersey were among the states warning Coinbase its staking product does not comply with securities rules.
articles.title: Coinbase Hit With Pending Cease and Desist Orders From 11 States

articles.description: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan

articles.description: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.
articles.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development

articles.description: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.
articles.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?

articles.description: InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue share their stance on why mobile gaming is essential to Web3 adoption and general success in the video games industry.
articles.title: You 'Have' to Be on Mobile: InfiniGods Cofounders on Gaming

articles.description: Ahead of this month's Proof of Talk event in Paris on June 14 and June 15, X Ventures co-founder and the event's co-organizer Dr. Matthias Reiser said nothing's changed for those with a "long-term view" of the industry. Still, events like the collapse of Terra and FTX in 20222 have certainly damaged investors' trust in crypto.
articles.title: Crypto Chaos of 2022 'Didn't Damage Technology Underlying the Industry': X Ventures Co-Founder Matthias Reiser

articles.description: Justin Sun, Tron founder and advisor to crypto exchange Huobi, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott about the impact of Hong Kong allowing residents to trade crypto, complications of restricting access based on location, and how AI will change the industry.
articles.title: Tron's Justin Sun Thinks Hong Kong Will Be a Big Fiat Onramp for Crypto

articles.description: Computer tech firm NVIDIA profited off the crypto mining industry. Now, it's looking to artificial intelligence—and its stock price is soaring.
articles.title: NVIDIA's AI Push Could Change Gaming Forever

articles.description: The InfiniGods founders share their approach to game development and offer a critique of games that call themselves "AAA."
articles.title: Why InfiniGods Laughs at 'AAA' Web3 Games

articles.description: After six years running, EthCC is back, this time in Paris from July 17 to July 20. Decrypt sat down with the brains behind one of Ethereum’s longest-running events Jerome de Tychey to get an inside look into what’s on the agenda this year, several unannounced guests, and the rollout of at least one “secret” DeFi project.
articles.title: Make it Fast, Make it Friendly: Jerome de Tychey Unpacks Key Themes at This Year's EthCC

articles.description: The Unioverse is a multimedia sci-fi franchise with plans to facilitate user-generated content. Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin checked out the Unioverse as Reyu, an alien character, and navigated the Proving Grounds with him. In the Proving Grounds, you'll fight an array of different drone-like flying robots (some have tentacles!!) as you navigate the puzzle-like dystopian environment. Alien meets Portal, anyone?
articles.title: Unioverse Game Preview: Hands-on With the Cinematic Proving Grounds

articles.description: Jeffrey Butler started his game development career producing EverQuest. Now, he's Avalon's Chief Product Officer. Butler told Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he wants to create a customizable world where users can create their own worlds and in-game content.
articles.title: EverQuest Producer Jeffrey Butler on How Ready Player One Led Him to Web3 Project Avalon

articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP conference organizer Chris Gonsalves believes crypto and tech could rejuvenate and reinvent the esports industry. In an interview, he tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why he thinks esports organizations should shake up their approach.
articles.title: Esports Orgs Should Become More Like Tech Companies: Community Gaming CEO

articles.description: GG's Kate Irwin takes us on a journey inside Mirandus, the upcoming MMORPG from Gala Games.
articles.title: SNEAK PEEK: Inside Mirandus From Gala Games
